=== Introduction ===
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="width:100%; margin-top:20px;" style="width:400px; border:none; padding-right:20px; vertical-align:top;"><nowiki>[[File:MalaysianTeam/ubuntu-my-400px.jpg]]</nowiki>
| <style="border:none; vertical-align:top;">The Ubuntu Malaysia LoCo Team (MalaysianTeam) aims to be the one stop for everything Ubuntu and for Malaysian Ubuntu lovers to gather, to share, meetup or even just to hang out. Embracing the humanity theme of Ubuntu, we welcome all who are interested in Ubuntu, GNU/Linux and Open Source Software in general to join us making Malaysia great for Ubuntu, GNU/Linux and Open Source.<<BR>><<BR>>Started in July 2005, the Malaysian Team has already grown to over 300 members and has been approved as official LoCo team since 2009. With this, we would like to maintain ourselves as official LoCo team, and this wiki is to prepare ourselves for the re-approval process after the team's application expired on Oct 30^th^, 2012.
|}

=== Roadmap for 2012/2013 ===
{{https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-DNIQOZSNb0g/UKToaXIoISI/AAAAAAAAEYw/qhozODdla6w/s800/Ubuntu-MY%2520Organisation%2520Chart.png}}
* Strengthening Ubuntu-MY structure by:
** Finding more volunteer to be key-members in Ubuntu-MY for each team as stated in <nowiki>[[https://docs.google.com/drawings/d/1dmFJkLzzWlCAnilsbrY3tdtbInVnA02EGteiNa0H0sU/edit | Ubuntu-MY Organisation Chart]]</nowiki>
** Full documentation for encouraging existing and incoming Ubuntu-MY members to be registered into launchpad, and take part in all Ubuntu-MY project.
** To fully comply of Ubuntu-LoCo requirement as an Approved LoCo members.
* New activites:
** Juju & Ubuntu Cloud Awareness activities
** Juju Charm School  
 
=== Achievements of 2011/2012 Roadmap ===
* '''Registered with ROS'''
** We put K.I.V status on this plan since in order to achieve this we need a numbers of active members who can give more commitment to Ubuntu-MY. So, for 2012/2013 we will try to gather the most active members and strengthening Ubuntu-MY first as stated in the roadmap above.     
* '''Spreading Ubuntu''' (continuous efforts)
** This is our on-going process where we always spread the Ubuntu to various organization as well as individuals. 
** Malaysian Blog about Ubuntu: 
** <nowiki>[[http://melayubuntu.blogspot.com]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://www.deensokmo.blogspot.com]]</nowiki>
** Ubuntu Awareness campaign: 
** <nowiki>[[MalaysianTeam-Activities-2012-UbuntuAwareness12.04]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[MalaysianTeam-Activities-2012-UbuntuAwareness12.10]]</nowiki>
** Ubuntu-My Community Awareness campaign:
** <nowiki>[[MalaysianTeam-Activities-2012-UbuntuAwareness-Ubuntu-MYAwarenessCampaign]]</nowiki>

* '''Provide local supports''' (continuous efforts)
** We found that most Malaysians are actively using Facebook for online communication. Therefore, we took an effort to manage <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/groups/ubuntumy|Ubuntu Malaysia LoCo Team group on Facebook]]</nowiki> which '''currently have almost 2000 members''' &nbsp;&mdash;&nbsp; '''from only 795 members last year''' &nbsp;&mdash;&nbsp; for easy local support. <<BR>><<BR>>{{http://i.imgur.com/3vk3j.png}}
  
* We still maintain our IRC channel #ubuntu-my on freenode for realtime local support.
* Our LoCo forum, at http://forums.ubuntu.com.my is also available for local support via forum. But lately, people are more on facebook.
* '''More Ubuntu activities''' (continuous efforts)
** Please refer to the '''Experiences / Efforts''' section below.
* '''Involve in Ubuntu Projects''' (continuous efforts)
** We have various teams involved with this:
** '''translations and localization (l10n)'''  &nbsp;&mdash;&nbsp;  we have done translations via launchpad (https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-ms); this is a continuous process
** '''documentations''' &nbsp;&mdash;&nbsp; Wiki (http://wiki.ubuntu.com.my) & Ubuntu Manual Project (http://ubuntu-manual.org/) and we are emphasising more on documentation for 2012/2013 as stated in roadmap above

=== Experience / Efforts ===
* '''Ubuntu-MY Poster 1^st^ October 2012 - Still Ongoing'''<<BR>>
 Ubuntu-MY are doing Ubuntu Awareness Project by providing ubuntu posters for free to schools and college around Malaysia.This project are still in progress in which the poster art has been <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MalaysianTeam/Activities#Ubuntu-MY_Ubuntu_Awareness_Poster_Competition | acquired via competition]]</nowiki> within Ubuntu-MY members in Facebook Group. We are now in the process of getting approval from all Ubuntu-MY key members for fund-raising donation. below are the poster's artwork that has been selected as a winner. 
{{http://i.imgur.com/CtJBe.png}}     

* '''Free & Open Source Software Campaign for Consumers FOMCA Digital Mall PJ 16^th^ June 2012'''
 <nowiki>[[http://a2knetwork.org/fomcas-project-encourage-pc-vendors-distribute-usable-free-operating-system | FOMCA (Federation Of Malaysian Consumer Association)]]</nowiki> organising an event to encourage vendor to ship low-cost laptop with usable and free operating system. Ubuntu-MY took parts in the events and promoting ubuntu. Ubuntu CD's in this project are provided by Canonical. 
{{http://i.imgur.com/2MGXt.jpg}}  {{http://i.imgur.com/TNckr.jpg}}
